Name: HMS Vetch
Renamed:
Patrai in 1945
Olympic Hunter in 1951
Otori Maru No.18 in 1956
Propulsion:
Two cylindrical fire tube boilers
vertical triple-expansion steam engine
Range: 3,500 nautical miles at 12 knots (6,500 km at 22 km/h)
Armament:
1 × BL 4 inch Mk IX naval gun,
1 × QF 2-pounder naval gun,
4 × Oerlikon 20 mm cannon
2 × stern depth charge racks with 40 depth charges
1 × Hedgehog A/S mortar
